title: Owners of clink, ConEmu, Cygwin Bash
body: Anyone know where to contact the owners of these consoles / shells? Trying to reach out to assess compatibility. Meanwhile, I'll keep searching. Thanks --Rich

comments.body: The owner of ConEmu responds very quickly to issues on https://code.google.com/p/conemu-maximus5/issues/list that's how I always contact him ;-)
For Cygwin Bash is appears to be Eric Blake (http://cygwin.com/who.html) and it looks like his email address is eblake@redhat.com.
